experience: You and Kiril both know Debbi Grogan, April Knapp, and 4 others
You both studied at Northern Arizona University
Kiril studied at Northern Arizona University after you started

- Teach JLS 284 Basic Photojournalism class at NAU School of Communication in the spring of 2018- Collaborate with NAU in producing a documentary films, photography projects, and multimedia presentations on campus- Organize student presentations on campus
Freelance Photography Services, Weddings, Portraits, Events, Calendars, Playing Cards, Workshops- Landscape, Wildlife, Macro, Creative.

-Developing my "Stars for the Future"​ project.-The purpose of the project is to explore the science of Astronomy and Planetology with Dine students from the STAR School in Leupp, Arizona. The children will be participants in various culturally appropriate science activities:      Telescope observations, Astro-Photography workshops, Astronomy photo-exhibition, Short "Solar System" multimedia production.- I care greatly for the growth and understanding of the Dine culture.  Utilizing this grant will enable the children  to be exposed to the opportunities that Space Science and Engineering can offer.  Instilling goals and dreams in the youth will further assist the necessary evolution of the Space Sciences.
Internship project - to make an educational film: "Creating a Culture of Sustainability on Campus".
